Member Function Documentation

bool SourceFile::ExtractContents ( string  directory  ) 

Saves the embedded file contents to the specified directory with the filename determined by the contents of the location field.

Parameters:
contents - the contents of the embedded file
Returns:
true on success
false if file is not embedded or other error

References mContents, and mLocation.

bool SourceFile::IsActive ( const FeatureOptionVector &  features  )  const
Parameters:
features - the features used to evaluate whether this file is required
Returns:
the result of evaluating the condition with respect to the value of the features

void SourceFile::SetContents ( string  contents  ) 

Sets the embedded file contents to the specified string. If the string is empty, the contents are cleared and this source file will no longer be embedded.

Parameters:
contents - the contents of the embedded file

References mContents.

bool SourceFile::SetLocation ( string  location  ) 
Parameters:
location - the remote location of the source file
Returns:
true if the location is properly formatted (currently only checks for a lack of whitespace)

References mLocation.
